NATIONAL LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, Petitioner, v. PAYMASTER OIL MILL CO., a Division of Anderson, Clayton & Co., Inc., Respondent. No. 30867. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. June 1, 1971. *148Marcel Mallet-Prevost, Asst. Gen. Counsel, N. L. R. B., Washington, D. C., Charles M. Paschal, Director Region 15, N. L. R. B., New Orleans, La., Edward Wendel, Atty., N. L. R. B., Washington, D. C., Arnold Ordman, Gen. Counsel, Dominick L. Manoli, Associate Gen. Counsel, Elliott Moore, Atty., N. L. R. B., for petitioner. Louis A. Fuselier, Emile C. Ott, Jackson, Miss., for respondent; Fuselier, Hector & Ott, Jackson, Miss., of counsel.

Before GEWIN, BELL and MORGAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

Enforced. See Local Rule 21.1

. See NLRB v. Amalgamated Clothing Workers of America, 5 Cir., 1970, 430 F.2d 966.
